trans-unit.source: Your creatures can't be the target of your opponents' spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: Your creatures can't be the target of your opponents' spells or abilities.

trans-unit.source: During your draw phase, draw an additional card.
trans-unit.target: During your draw phase, draw an additional card.

trans-unit.source: Each of your noncreature artifacts is also an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its total casting cost.
trans-unit.target: Each of your noncreature artifacts is also an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its total casting cost.

trans-unit.source: Each of your basic lands may be tapped to produce any color of mana instead of its normal type.
trans-unit.target: Each of your basic lands may be tapped to produce any color of mana instead of its normal type.

trans-unit.source: Whenever you tap a land for mana, it produces one additional mana of the same type.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you tap a land for mana, it produces one additional mana of the same type.

trans-unit.source: Your opponents play with their hands face up.
trans-unit.target: Your opponents play with their hands face up.

trans-unit.source: Your creatures are unaffected by summoning sickness.
trans-unit.target: Your creatures are unaffected by summoning sickness.

trans-unit.source: You may sacrifice a permanent to return any creature to its owner's hand. Play this ability as an instant.
trans-unit.target: You may sacrifice a permanent to return any creature to its owner's hand. Play this ability as an instant.

trans-unit.source: Whenever any of your creatures damages any creature or player, gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: Whenever any of your creatures damages any creature or player, gain 1 life.

trans-unit.resname: PVAN·203 | Greven il-Vec | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever any of your creatures damages any creature, bury the damaged creature.
trans-unit.target: Whenever any of your creatures damages any creature, bury the damaged creature.

trans-unit.source: Your spells cost o1 less to play.
trans-unit.target: Your spells cost o1 less to play.

trans-unit.source: Your creatures can block as though they had flying.
trans-unit.target: Your creatures can block as though they had flying.

trans-unit.source: Attacking doesn't cause your creatures to tap.
trans-unit.target: Attacking doesn't cause your creatures to tap.

trans-unit.source: During your draw phase, you may draw an additional card and then put any card in your hand on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: During your draw phase, you may draw an additional card and then put any card in your hand on the bottom of your library.

trans-unit.source: Whenever any of your creatures is put into your graveyard from play, you may put that creature on top of your library.
trans-unit.target: Whenever any of your creatures is put into your graveyard from play, you may put that creature on top of your library.

trans-unit.source: You may redirect to yourself any amount of damage dealt to creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: You may redirect to yourself any amount of damage dealt to creatures you control.

trans-unit.source: All creatures you control gain shadow. (Those creatures can block and be blocked only by creatures with shadow.)
trans-unit.target: All creatures you control gain shadow. (Those creatures can block and be blocked only by creatures with shadow.)

trans-unit.source: All creatures you control get +X/+0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
trans-unit.target: All creatures you control get +X/+0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

trans-unit.source: You may untap any attacking creatures you control and remove them from combat.
trans-unit.target: You may untap any attacking creatures you control and remove them from combat.

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control is put into a graveyard from play, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature you control is put into a graveyard from play, draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: PVAN·306 | Sidar Kondo | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o3: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: o3: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: PVAN·307 | Sliver Queen, Brood Mother | Card Name
PVAN·307 | Sliver Queen, Brood Mother | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o3: Put a Sliver token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 colorless creature.
trans-unit.target: o3: Put a Sliver token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 colorless creature.

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: Sacrifice a creature: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature successfully damages you, destroy it.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature successfully damages you, destroy it.

trans-unit.source: o3: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: o3: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.source: Double all damage dealt by creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: Double all damage dealt by creatures you control.

trans-unit.source: You may play artifact, creature, and enchantment spells any time you could play an instant.
trans-unit.target: You may play artifact, creature, and enchantment spells any time you could play an instant.

trans-unit.source: You may play an additional land each of your turns.
trans-unit.target: You may play an additional land each of your turns.

trans-unit.source: o3: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: o3: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a permanent: Regenerate target creature.
trans-unit.target: Sacrifice a permanent: Regenerate target creature.
